_sText:
Made back in 2005 hamster balls was a quick hour map challenge given to me by my friends.

It also featured in 3rd place in dimension studios summer mapping competition

5 v 5 team death match, players must push the hamster balls around knocking their opponents off the map and into the death pit.

You auto Regen health and get 100 bullets to move the hamster ball with.

Afak this is the first hamster ball concept map for counter strike source

To adjust the hamster ball speeds use this rcon command
sv_physpushscale X
